forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Monday Update: Our Writers Are Still Coming Up With a Codename

comments.text: Hi everyone! Here's what's new in Update 160.23 (you're on [version])! Hope you enjoy!
The "Change Things" button now looks more like the Option checkbox button it is (with its icon optimized for understandability & resolution visibility, thx Ferny & Nic!) ...
... and other main dialog parts were tuned in alignment & icon positioning! [steamimage: 964242094218274032/F3E021124E40AE168F8C79E6142DCE2A555DC2AA/]
The "Replace Instances in Area" buttons are now grouped and have icons (and are called "Replace Same in Area"), among other design optimizations in the Thing -> More dialog!
You can now use the new [person] text placeholder, which means the name of the person whose body part/ attachment (or sticky) this is!
Placeholders like [person] are now also replaced in Tells! So you can use e.g. "When starts then tell body [person]". Thanks Frank, Rusty & Xau!
The hand grab sphere is now shown when you start equipping a hand-replacing arm in Me mode!
And Update 160.25: The ring glow is now smoothly transitioning when toggling "Change Things" mode (and is also visible while e.g. editing) to give better visibility to its meaning!

thread.latestCommentText: And Update 160.25: The ring glow is now smoothly transitioning when changing "Change Things" mode (and is also visible while e.g. editing) to give better visibility to its meaning!
